TextView.android:text: Rivne's W is an AOE stun. It doesn't do insane amounts of damage, but when casted with other abilities it can be used to burst. Usually I will use w in a e-wq combo, another time i will is using e-q-q-w-q which will keep them stunned for a brief period and do significannt damage. Basically it is a AOE stun around riven so use it whenever a stun is needed or in a combo.
